channel.title: Need rune cross bow help!
channel.description:
How can I fix the Rune Crossbow? At the moment, it attacks like a weapon. Yes it goes in the weapon slot. No it is not a "Non existing item"
I have very basic knowledge of this sort of thing. I want it to do the same animation as the the actual c bow, and to train ranged instead of strength.

item.title: Need rune cross bow help!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

How can I fix the Rune Crossbow?
At the moment, it attacks like a weapon.
Yes it goes in the weapon slot.
No it is not a “Non existing item”

I have very basic knowledge of this sort of thing. I want it to do the same animation as the the actual c bow, and to train ranged instead of strength.
